holidays.title: Auckland Anniversary Day
holidays.description: Let us raise our spirits and toast in honor of Auckland's Anniversary Day.

holidays.title: Chinese Lunar New Year's Day
holidays.description: We say, “Out with the old and in with the new,” on this auspicious holiday!

holidays.title: Chinese New Year
holidays.description: A celebration marked by good food, red envelopes, and blessings for everyone.

holidays.title: Curmudgeons Day
holidays.description: Wave at the fussed-up cashier at your grocery store and call your grumpy old grandpa.

holidays.title: Freethinkers Day
holidays.description: You have the freedom of thought, so feel free to think outside the box.

holidays.title: Kansas Day
holidays.description: Get ready to learn about what makes Kansas Day so deserving of national recognition.

holidays.title: Korean New Year
holidays.description: Korean New Year, one of the most important national holidays in Korea, is celebrated with great festivities.

holidays.title: National Carnation Day
holidays.description: Carnations are available all season and for every reason. It's National Carnation Day.

holidays.title: National Corn Chip Day
holidays.description: Open that big bag of chips and munch away; this day was made for just that!

holidays.title: RNLI SOS day
holidays.description: Let’s help everyone feel safe even when they’re surrounded by a body of water!

holidays.title: Seeing-Eye Guide Dog Anniversary
holidays.description: Kudos to all the dogs who act as their humans' eyes and ears.

holidays.title: Seollal
holidays.description: Seollal is considered one of the most important traditional Korean holidays.

holidays.title: Chinese Spring Festival
holidays.description: We’ll help you discover how thousands of Chinese diaspora in Mauritius celebrate the Spring Festival.

holidays.title: Tet Eve
holidays.description: Prepare your offerings to ask for peace as you celebrate Tet Eve!

holidays.title: Tet Nguyen Dan
holidays.description: Why is Tet Nguyen Dan celebrated in February? Find out here!

holidays.title: Brian David Gilbert’s Birthday
holidays.description: Let’s celebrate Brian David Gilbert’s wacky comedy and creative genius on his birthday!

holidays.title: Charlie Wilson’s Birthday
holidays.description: This iconic R.&.B. singer was named “Billboard” magazine’s Number one Adult R.&.B. singer.

holidays.title: Oprah Winfrey’s Birthday
holidays.description: Her interview with Michael Jackson is one of the most watched interviews of all time.

holidays.title: Tom Selleck’s Birthday
holidays.description: Tom Selleck didn't have any social media accounts — yet he was a very interesting man.
